mapper.update:
update POS_REWARD_DETAIL
PROFIT_POS_DATE = #{profitPosDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
POS_AGENT_ID = #{posAgentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
POS_AGENT_NAME = #{posAgentName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
POS_MECHANISM_TYPE = #{posMechanismType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
POS_MECHANISM_ID = #{posMechanismId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
POS_COMPARE_COUNT = #{posCompareCount,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
POS_CURRENT_COUNT = #{posCurrentCount,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
POS_COMPARE_LOAN_COUNT = #{posCompareLoanCount,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
POS_CURRENT_LOAN_COUNT = #{posCurrentLoanCount,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
POS_AMT = #{posAmt,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
POS_STANDARD = #{posStandard,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
POS_OWN_REWARD = #{posOwnReward,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
POS_DOWN_REWARD = #{posDownReward,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
POS_REAWRD_PROFIT = #{posReawrdProfit,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
POS_REMARK = #{posRemark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
POS_CHECK_DEDUCT_AMT = #{posCheckDeductAmt,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ORGID = #{orgid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SETTLEMONTH1812TOTALTRANS = #{settlemonth1812totaltrans,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
SETTLEMONTHTOTALTRANS = #{settlemonthtotaltrans,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
ISSTANDARD = #{isstandard,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TOTALORDER = #{totalorder,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
YEARAFTER19TOTALTRANS = #{yearafter19totaltrans,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CONTRASTMONTH = #{contrastmonth,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
NEWTRANSAMOUNT = #{newtransamount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
YEARAFTER19CREDITTRANS = #{yearafter19credittrans,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CHILD_AGENT_ID_LIST = #{childAgentIdList,jdbcType=CLOB},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
